translation.dev: Creating software is both my hobby and profession.
translation.aboutMe: Hi there! Welcome to my portfolio. I'm a Full Cycle Developer, which means I get involved in everything related to software development, from the very beginning to the end. Here you'll find several projects that showcase my abilities, both in Front-End and Back-End, not forgetting about DevOps and agile practices. I'm super excited to work with you on your next project. Shall we get started?
